name: Cyberpunk 2077
description: Cyberpunk 2077 is an open-world, action-adventure RPG set in the dark future of Night City — a dangerous megalopolis obsessed with power, glamor, and ceaseless body modification.
processor: Intel Core i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen 3 3300X
graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3 GB or AMD Radeon RX 580 4 GB

name: The Witcher 3
description: You are Geralt of Rivia, mercenary monster slayer. Before you stands a war-torn, monster-infested continent you can explore at will. Your current contract? Tracking down Ciri — the Child of Prophecy, a living weapon that can alter the shape of the world.
processor: Intel Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz or AMD Phenom II X4 940
graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7870 (2 GB VRAM)

name: Elden Ring
description: THE NEW FANTASY ACTION RPG. Rise, Lightless One, and may grace guide you to embrace the power of the Elden Circle and rise as Circle Lord in the Lands Between.
processor: Intel Core i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen 3 3300X
graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3 GB or AMD Radeon RX 580 4 GB

name: Beyond: Two Souls
description: A unique psychological action thriller delivered by A-list Hollywood performances by Elliot Page and Willem Dafoe. Take on the remarkable life of Jodie Holmes, linked since birth to a mysterious entity called Aiden. Your actions determine her fate across extraordinary challenges around the globe.
processor: Intel Core i5-4430 @ 3.0 GHz or AMD FX-6300 @ 3.5 GHz
graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 with 2GB VRAM or AMD Radeon HD 7870 with 2GB VRAM

name: Nine Sols
description: Nine Sols is a lore-rich, hand-drawn 2D action-platformer featuring Sekiro-inspired deflection focused combat. Explore the land once home to an ancient alien race and slay the 9 Sols.
processor: AMD Athlon X4 | Intel Core i5-4460
graphics: NVIDIA GTX 950 | AMD R7 370

name: Heavy Rain
description: Experience a gripping psychological thriller filled with innumerable twists and turns. The hunt is on for a murderer known only as the Origami Killer. Four characters, each following their own leads, must take part in a desperate attempt to prevent the killer from claiming a new victim.
processor: Intel Core i5-4430 @ 3.0 GHz or AMD FX-6300 @ 3.5 GHz
graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 with 2GB VRAM or AMD Radeon HD 7870 with 2GB VRAM

name: Detroit: Become Human
description: Detroit: Become Human puts the destiny of both mankind and androids in your hands, taking you to a near future where machines have become more intelligent than humans. Every choice you make affects the outcome of the game, with one of the most intricately branching narratives ever created.
processor: Intel Core i5-2300 @ 2.8 GHz or AMD Ryzen 3 1200 @ 3.1GHz or AMD FX-8350 @ 4.2GHz
graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 780 or AMD HD 7950 with 3GB VRAM (Vulkan 1.1 support required)

name: Celeste
description: Help Madeline survive her inner demons on her journey to the top of Celeste Mountain, in this super-tight platformer from the creators of TowerFall. Brave hundreds of hand-crafted challenges, uncover devious secrets, and piece together the mystery of the mountain.
processor: Intel Core i3 M380
graphics: Intel HD 4000

name: Hollow Knight
description: Forge your own path in Hollow Knight! An epic action adventure through a vast ruined kingdom of insects and heroes. Explore twisting caverns, battle tainted creatures and befriend bizarre bugs, all in a classic, hand-drawn 2D style.
processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1 GB VRAM)

name: A Plague Tale: Requiem
description: Embark on a heartrending journey into a brutal, breathtaking world, and discover the cost of saving those you love in a desperate struggle for survival. Strike from the shadows or unleash hell with a variety of weapons, tools and unearthly powers.
processor: Intel Core i5-4690K / AMD FX-8300
graphics: GeForce GTX 970 / Radeon RX 590 (4 GB VRAM)

name: Control Ultimate Edition
description: Winner of over 80 awards, Control is a visually stunning third-person action-adventure that will keep you on the edge of your seat.
processor: Intel Core i5-4690 / AMD FX-4350
graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780 / AMD Radeon R9 280X

name: Hollow Knight: Silksong
description: Discover a vast, haunted kingdom in Hollow Knight: Silksong! Explore, fight and survive as you ascend to the peak of a land ruled by silk and song.
processor: Intel Core i3-3240 / AMD FX-4300
graphics: GeForce GTX 560 Ti (1 GB) / Radeon HD 7750 (1 GB)

name: Cuphead
description: Cuphead is a classic run and gun action game heavily focused on boss battles. Inspired by cartoons of the 1930s, the visuals and audio are painstakingly created with the same techniques of the era, i.e. traditional hand drawn cel animation, watercolor backgrounds, and original jazz recordings.
processor: Intel Core2 Duo E8400 / AMD Athlon 64 X2 6000+ (3.0 GHz)
graphics: GeForce 9600 GT / AMD HD 3870 (512-MB VRAM)

name: Neva
description: Experience the moving tale of a young woman and her lifelong bond with a magnificent wolf as they embark on a thrilling adventure through a rapidly dying world.
processor: Intel Core i5-4570T / AMD FX-4350
graphics: GeForce GTX 650 / Radeon HD 7750 (1 GB VRAM)

name: Stardew Valley
description: A farming simulation RPG with crafting, relationships, and exploration. Build your farm, befriend villagers, and uncover secrets.
processor: 2 GHz
graphics: Graphics card with 256 MB video memory and Shader Model 3.0+

name: Hades
description: A rogue-like action-RPG where you battle out of the Greek Underworld as Zagreus, prince of the Underworld, facing gods and monsters.
processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz
graphics: 1 GB VRAM / DirectX 10+ support

name: Dead Cells
description: A rogue-vania action-platformer with procedurally generated levels, fast combat, and permadeath mechanics.
processor: Intel i5+
graphics: Nvidia 450 GTS / Radeon HD 5750 or better

name: Ori and the Will of the Wisps
description: A visually stunning action‐platformer adventure in a vast and beautiful world, full of fluid movement, emotional story and exploration.
processor: Intel Core i5-4460 or AMD Athlon X4
graphics: Nvidia GTX 950 / AMD R7 370

name: Dark Souls III
description: A dark fantasy action-RPG where you face harrowing challenges, forge your path through the ruins of Lothric and confront the abyss.
processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD FX-6300
graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti / ATI Radeon HD 7950

name: Dark Souls: Remastered
description: The original Dark Souls – a critically acclaimed action-RPG that defined the modern “souls‐like” genre.
processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6850 3.0 GHz / AMD Phenom II X2 545 3.0 GHz
graphics: GeForce 9800 GTX+ / Radeon HD 4870

name: Red Dead Redemption
description: An epic open‐world action-adventure set in the American frontier, you play as John Marston, a former outlaw tasked with hunting down his former gang members in exchange for his freedom.
processor: Intel Core i5-4670 or AMD FX-9590
graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or AMD Radeon R7 360

name: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: A prequel to the original, this massive open-world action-adventure follows Arthur Morgan and the Van der Linde gang in the waning days of the Wild West, blending deep narrative, exploration and survival.
processor: Intel Core i5-2500K or AMD FX-6300
graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 770 or AMD Radeon R9 280

name: Cyber Shadow
developer: Mechanical Head Studios / Yacht Club Games
description: A retro-inspired 2D action-platformer with fast-paced ninja gameplay and pixel-art visuals.
processor: 2.0 GHz or more (32-bit supported)
graphics: ATI Radeon X1300 / Nvidia GeForce 6600 GT / Intel HD 3000 or better

name: Assassin’s Creed II
description: Embark on the journey of Ezio Auditore in Renaissance Italy – a blend of action, adventure and narrative in the second major installment of the series.
processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 1.8 GHz or AMD Athlon X2 2.4 GHz
graphics: 256 MB DirectX 9.0–compliant card with Shader Model 3.0 or higher

name: Assassin’s Creed Odyssey
description: Set in ancient Greece—an open-world action-RPG that emphasises exploration, narrative choices and epic vistas.
processor: Intel Core i5-2400 @ 3.1 GHz or AMD FX 6300 @ 3.8 GHz
graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 (2 GB VRAM) or AMD Radeon R9 285 (2 GB VRAM)

name: Monster Hunter: World
description: An action-RPG open world where you hunt massive monsters, craft weapons and armor, explore vivid ecosystems, and cooperate with other players.
processor: Intel Core i5-4460 3.20GHz or AMD FX-6300
graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD Radeon R7 260x (2 GB VRAM)

name: A Plague Tale: Innocence
description: Embark on a heartrending journey into a brutal, breathtaking world, as young Amicia and her brother Hugo struggle to survive amid war, rats and the plague.
processor: Intel Core i3-2120 (3.3 GHz) / AMD FX-4100 X4 (3.6 GHz)
graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 / AMD Radeon HD 7870 (2 GB VRAM)
